mapper.select: SELECT /* CodeDetailMapper.selectAllCodeDetail */ GROUP_CODE , CODE , CODE_NAME , REFERENCE_VALUE_1 , REFERENCE_VALUE_2 , DISPLAY_SEQUENCE FROM CODE_DETAIL ORDER BY GROUP_CODE, DISPLAY_SEQUENCE, CODE

SELECT /* CodeDetailMapper.selectCodeDetailByGroupCode */ GROUP_CODE , CODE , CODE_NAME , REFERENCE_VALUE_1 , REFERENCE_VALUE_2 , DISPLAY_SEQUENCE FROM CODE_DETAIL WHERE GROUP_CODE = #{groupCode} ORDER BY DISPLAY_SEQUENCE, CODE

SELECT /* CodeDetailMapper.selectCodeDetailByPk */ GROUP_CODE , CODE , CODE_NAME , REFERENCE_VALUE_1 , REFERENCE_VALUE_2 , DISPLAY_SEQUENCE FROM CODE_DETAIL WHERE GROUP_CODE = #{groupCode} AND CODE = #{code}
